New Records: Virat Kohli became the 2nd India batter to score 3000 runs vs South Africa
Virat Kohli is the sixth batter in the world to score 3000 runs across formats against South Africa
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli and Shreyas Iyer added 103 runs between themselves from 126 balls
Kohli had completed his half-century from 67 balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: Virat Kohli grafted the innings against South Africa at Eden Gardens after Rohit Sharma and Shubman Gill fell in quick succession inside 11 overs of the game
Others: Virat Kohli's best score in Test cricket came against South Africa back in 2019
Virat Kohli also equalled Sachin Tendulkar in another elite feat by reaching 6000 runs at home in the 32nd over
